Two friends reused one prime to quickly send secret notes. Eavesdropper Eve intercepted two different RSA keys and ciphertexts: 35016728553921577903663059006740512450753099857027402720440415463536267167656378496545640982810549652011854033672920907522705746154648522236676879983741487181082240270993712464213026966186946574198835958624314216782657171407674379. Can you recover the hidden message?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=750836358505932513073676681217208856771117844825644949471791309170454355847085921144474893406116159760154415179975335102795992629692895017482373758867546688631544195214992302237062371058510670293655329896350529309751649029224713097, n2=1315472098218472769786895521359572693056577479893337811224413542240632878800439753479097487029873639385070597477235010279600633280547659142335114681017750154854965050786375592078159225822647410636059633270508384292074756535390081713, e=278174364706294318751339978230916084500822676311239728784212991493138538427808319919229076469087382787726632918942536223466170933443807873646078967102417187837813243689375347202656942397761599891513542899766251437336042528786873769

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{jdqc3d8u}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 35016728553921577903663059006740512450753099857027402720440415463536267167656378496545640982810549652011854033672920907522705746154648522236676879983741487181082240270993712464213026966186946574198835958624314216782657171407674379
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=750836358505932513073676681217208856771117844825644949471791309170454355847085921144474893406116159760154415179975335102795992629692895017482373758867546688631544195214992302237062371058510670293655329896350529309751649029224713097, n2=1315472098218472769786895521359572693056577479893337811224413542240632878800439753479097487029873639385070597477235010279600633280547659142335114681017750154854965050786375592078159225822647410636059633270508384292074756535390081713, e=278174364706294318751339978230916084500822676311239728784212991493138538427808319919229076469087382787726632918942536223466170933443807873646078967102417187837813243689375347202656942397761599891513542899766251437336042528786873769
extra_info: p=37045797196574559914091325925703324830680468597618780760083877776699043531871658993175123977975432277384369118142547, q=20267787855172910303722090130780845196087801794653852135364694467206453630281841807925883274667865845400750981945651, q2=35509347827993506190801546210260002719564040098203030885460887313186608800734181124206543197036384223609534369001579, φ(n)=750836358505932513073676681217208856771117844825644949471791309170454355847085921144474893406116159760154415179975277789210940882222677204066317274697519920361151922582096853664818465561348516792854228889097886011628863909124624900, φ(n2)=1315472098218472769786895521359572693056577479893337811224413542240632878800439753479097487029873639385070597477234937724455608712481554249462978717690199910346269228974730047313069340170314804795942251603333372475573762631902937588
